participant_1.background:
I am a 25 year old male who is concerned about his health and weight.
i hate winter.
I'm struggling with school but I'm happy with my family.
My collection of movie tickets reminds me of my favorite films.
I love to knit to relieve stress and keep my hands busy.

participant_2.background:
I am from a small town in the Midwest where life is slower and more relaxed.
I've been at my current job for 3 years.
I'm not as open about my interests as I would like to be, but I love baseball and fishing.
i am hoping to play.
I'm a proud dog dad to my two puppies.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
I am good, just finished a hike with my puppies. How are you doing?
I'm doing well, I just finished knitting a scarf.
Oh that's great! What kind of scarf?
It's a simple garter stitch scarf. I'm hoping to make some more soon.
That's awesome! I'm not very crafty, but I love watching people who are.
Thanks! I've been knitting for a few years, but I'm still learning new things all the time.
That's awesome! I wish I had more hobbies.
Well, you could always learn to knit! It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I think I'll stick to hiking for now. My dogs love it.
That's great! I love hiking too.
Maybe we could go hiking together sometime!
That would be fun! I'll bring my knitting
